item.title: Toronto: Jafar Panahi Calls for a World Where “We’re All Free” Amid Authoritarian Threats
item.description: The Iranian auteur called for people to take heed of signs that point to rising political repression worldwide while accepting an award at the Toronto Film Festival’s Tribute Awards.

item.title: Toronto: Jafar Panahi Calls for a World Where “We’re All Free” Amid Authoritarian Threats

item.title: Toronto Awards Analysis: For ‘Roofman’ and ‘Rental Family,’ Channing Tatum and Brendan Fraser Join a Crowded Best Actor Field
item.description: Both films center on well-meaning professional liars played by actors with high Q scores, and are crowd pleasers to the extent that they will be strong candidates for the fest’s coveted audience award
